entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Antigonish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tracadie 1:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: SE 26 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 2 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning near noon then changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 2 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to ice pellets late this evening then to snow after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 11 except minus 15 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 11 except minus 15 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
